title: Auto Self Cast
body: Ok so before I fiddled with my settings I was able to auot self cast...like when i wasnt targeting anything it woulds automatically self cast on me. Examples include Liss Ult,m Ori shield, Morg shield etc.... I would ba able to have my cursor on nothing and press 'e' on Ori for example and it would self cast.  Now I have to press Alt- QWER... Idk what I did but I dont like it

replies.body:
I believe what you're looking for is *Self-cast*, which can be found in your *Hotkeys* settings. I'd recommend setting all your abilities to *Self-Cast* by default , then enable *Quick Cast* to see if this gets the results you're looking for.

Let me know if this helped!
